Responsible for leading the Schwab Retail Branch Network of 300+ offices in achieving our purpose of championing client financial goals with passion and integrity.  I lead the advice and service delivery of Financial Planning, Investing, Banking, and Strategic Planning for our Financial Consultants, Assistant Financial Consultants, and Customer Service in the Schwab Branch Network.  I work with a team of excellent people to challenge convention, champion clients, and change the way the world invests.

Responsible for leading and delivering affluent client household experiences in the Charles Schwab broad managed investment offerings.  Oversee the advice and service delivery of Schwab Private Client Service, Managed Portfolios, Financial Planning, High Net Worth/Trust & Estate consultations.
Lead the enterprise strategic development and planning process. Expand the business model to serve more clients through the holistic financial planning process.

summary: Terri R. Kallsen, Executive Vice President of Investor Services at the Charles Schwab Corporation, is responsible for driving profitable, long-term growth and increasing client loyalty in the retail business, serving individual investors. As the head of Investor Services, Terri and her team lead the Branch Network, including Independent Branch Services, Portfolio Consulting, Client Service & Support, Client Experience and Platforms, International & Special Business Development, and Supervision & Controls. Terri is a CERTIFIED FINANCIAL PLANNER™ practitioner, a Certified Wealth Strategist®, a member of the Financial Planning Association and she holds the Series 6, 7, 24, 63, 65 and 66 securities registrations.Terri joined Schwab in May of 2012. Previously, Terri was Senior Vice President of Wealth Management at USAA, where she led key enterprise strategies providing high-net-worth members with financial planning, risk management, asset accumulation, retirement income distribution and estate planning. Prior to joining USAA, Terri served as vice president for Thrivent Financial, where she provided strategic leadership to the sales and marketing process for insurance, investments and banking in 32 regional offices.
name: Terri Kallsen
title: Executive Vice President Investor Services at Charles Schwab
